entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I had no idea there were so many historical monuments and statues at golf courses. Thank goodness, Trump's out there protecting them for us. Thanks for letting us know.  

Any chance Trump will be doing anything to protect us from  coronavirus today? Like promoting mask wearing?
